meanings.definition: Showing excessive devotion to one's own nation.
meanings.sent1: The hypernationalistic student always wore the national colors to school.
meanings.sent2: The hypernationalistic speech stirred up strong emotions in the audience.
meanings.sent3: The hypernationalistic dog barked proudly at the sight of the flag.
meanings.sent4: His hypernationalistic attitude alienated those from other countries.
meanings.sent5: The hypernationalistic pride in her eyes was unmistakable.
